name: prisma-docs-search
title: Prisma Docs Search
description: Quickly access Prisma's AI-powered docs search feature, powered by kapa.ai, right from Raycast.
author: petra

commands.name: prisma-docs-search
commands.title: Search Prisma Docs
commands.description: Send search queries to Prisma's Docs AI and get results within Raycast

preferences.name: showMetadata
preferences.title: Result Information
preferences.label: Show details about the search result by default.
preferences.description: Useful information like time to search, word count, AI's confidence level, etc. about the search results.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
